Item.value: Workflow for processing a Change Request Revision.
Tast remains open in Change Manager's Inbox

WorkflowTemplate.name: Specialist: Derive ECN/MCN or Defer Change Request

Item.value: Derive ECN/MCN or Defer Change Request

WorkflowTemplate.name: Specialist: Complete impact analysis and Decide Approve/Reject/CRB/Rework

Item.value: 1. Complete impact analysis 2. Perform Cost Estimation 3. Propose Solution 4. Decide from below options: -Approve: This option approves the CR for implementation -Reject: This option closes the CR -CRB: This option sends the CR to Change Review Board (By Default Change Specialist 1 is a CRB member; Assign more member to CRB if needed before selecting this option) -Rework: This option sends the CR to Analyst (By default Requestor has already assigned an Analyst; Please re-assign analyst before selecting 'Rework' option if assignement needs to be changed)
Perform impact analysis and propose a solution.
Analyst assignment is checked and if empty the Specialist is prompted to assign it.
1. Assign the Analyst participant on the ECR. 2. Complete task when assignment done.

UserValue.title: handler_argument
UserValue.value: -source_task=Specialist: Complete impact analysis and Decide Approve/Reject/CRB/Rework

Item.value: 1. Describe Change 2. Assess Impact 3. Click on 'Complete' to progress ECR
Analyst assignment is checked and if empty the requestor is auto-assigned as Analyst.
Change Specialist 1 assignment is checked and if empty system will automatically send the assignment to Global Change Manager Pool

WorkflowTemplate.name: Change Review Board (CRB): Review Proposed Solution

Item.value: Change Review Board (CRB): Review Proposed Solution and make a cost benefit business decision.
CRB makes a cost-benefit business decision. - Approve - continue to implement the change - Reject - the Change Specialist will determine the intended disposition - record signoff comments
The Change Review Board (CRB) participant assignments are checked and if empty the Specialist is prompted to assign them.
Assign the Change Review Board (CRB) participants on the CR revision. The CRB will review the Proposed Solution. Complete task when assignment done.

WorkflowTemplate.name: System: Close Change and notify CR Rejected

Item.value: Notify Requestor & Analyst that the ECR was rejected.
